common.DryadSoft은(는) 북마크(BookMark) 앱을(를) 무료로 사용: DryadSoft has made the BookMark app available for free.
common.이 페이지는 방문자가 Google 서비스를 사용하기로 결정한 경우 개인: This page is used to inform visitors of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information if they decide to use our services.
common.서비스를 사용하시면 정책과 관련하여 정보를 수집하고 사용하는 것에 동의하: By using the Service, you consent to the collection and use of information in connection with the Policy. The personal information we collect is used to provide and improve the Service. We will not use or share your information under any circumstances except as described in this Privacy Policy.
common.본 개인 정보 취급 방침에서 사용되는 용어는 본 개인 정보 취급 방침에서: As used in this Privacy Policy, the terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, accessible from our Privacy Policy, accessible from our Website under the 'Terms and Conditions' section.
common.더 나은 경험을 위해 서비스를 사용하는 동안 특정 개인 식별 정보를 제공: For a better experience, you may be asked to provide certain personally identifiable information while using the Service. The information we request will be retained by us and used as described in this Privacy Policy.
common.앱은 귀하를 식별하는 데 사용되는 정보를 수집 할 수있는 제 3 자 서비: The App uses third-party services that may collect information that is used to identify you. Links to the privacy policies of the third-party service providers used by the App
common.서비스를 이용하는데 필요한 최소한의 식별정보(로그인ID)만을 이용하며 이: We use only the minimum identification information (login ID) necessary to use the service, and we never collect or store names, addresses, email information, etc. outside (servers, etc.).
common.이 서비스에는 다른 사이트에 대한 링크가 포함되어있을 수 있습니다. 제: This service may contain links to other sites. When you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. These external sites are not operated by DryadSoft; therefore, we encourage you to review the privacy policies of these websites. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party sites or services.
common.이 서비스는 전연령을 대상으로 합니다. 서비스를 이용하는데 필요한 최소한: The Service is intended for all ages. We use only the minimum identifying information (login ID) necessary to use the Service and never collect or store any personal information such as name, address, email, etc. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we can take the necessary steps.
The content of the service is intended for a global audience.
common.개인 정보 보호 정책은 수시로 업데이트 될 수 있습니다. 따라서 이 페이: Our Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time; therefore, we encourage you to review this page regularly for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes will be effective immediately after they are posted on this page.
common.개인 정보 보호 정책에 관한 질문이나 제안 사항이 있으시면 언제든지 저희: If you have any questions or suggestions regarding our Privacy Policy, please feel free to contact us.
